name: Automated
description: The facility is run almost entirely by AI and drone labor, requiring only a minimal maintenance crew.

name: Overcrowded
description: Built for half this many people, the station's life support is constantly strained.

name: Black Market
description: Hidden compartments and encrypted channels make this a haven for illicit trade.

name: Top Secret
description: Heavy encryption and armed guards keep the station's true purpose a mystery.

name: Luxury Amenities
description: High-end shopping, artificial parks, and gravity-wells attract the sector's elite.

name: Failing Life Support
description: The air is thin and the heat is inconsistent. The crew is desperate to leave.

name: Modular Expansion
description: Half-finished modules are being welded onto the hull, indicating rapid growth.

name: Religious Order
description: The station serves as a monastery or temple for a sect that finds solitude in the void.
